answers.answer: Everything. Anything lol. I didn't get to eat for 28 hours and it was seriously the worst thing ever. I had a "surprise" induction due to preeclampsia and I hadn't eaten before and it was so terrible
I plan my last meal to be a peanut butter and chocolate chip sandwich. I keeps me full the longest off all the foods I've eaten this pregnancy.
I wouldnt eat any the heavy. You dont want heart burn or having to poop alot, lol. Something your craving and that you know will satisfy you & baby.

question: Okay ladies I'm getting induced at 2 am doctor advise me to eat a early dinner Question is what should I eat ?!
title: last meal before being induced
